TopicTitle: How do I use the object thrower

Articles.Content: How to throw object on MacOS Big Sur V11.0.1.

is it cause you don't have middle mouse button?
I have no knowledge about macOS, can't you find a way to bind a key to middle mouse click?

I don't know anything about Mac OS, but in general:

You open the Object Thrower window and leave it open!

Click the "Arm" checkbox.

Aim with the cursor.

And middle mouse button (as antipro said) to shoot.
